info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Meagher, Judith Basin, western Fergus, southwestern Blaine, southeastern Chouteau and southeastern Cascade Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 543 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Big Sandy to 12 miles east of Geraldine to 8 miles east of Stanford to 24 miles southwest of Hobson. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. Heavy rain, snow, or graupel are also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Stanford, Geraldine, Denton, Hobson, Winifred, Moore, Geyser, Windham, Sapphire Village, Utica, Shonkin, Danvers, Loma, Hilger, Iliad, Virgelle, Buffalo, Moccasin and Ackley Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
